game.name: Witchfire
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Witchfire is a first-person dark fantasy RPG shooter in which you play as a wicked sinner turned witch hunter on his final mission to reach salvation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Witchfire is a first-person dark fantasy RPG shooter in which you play as a wicked sinner turned witch hunter on his final mission to reach salvation.

reviewHighlights.text: 총기류의 타격감도 매우 좋고, 약간의 스릴과 다양한 적들, 앞으로 기대되는 게임입니다
막 개쩌는 게임은 아닌데 해보면 이게 또 은근히 재밌어서 계속하게 됨
